thread.section_title: Commodities News, Commodity Trading Prices & Data | Reuters.com
thread.title: Chevron lifts quarterly dividend by 4 percent

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Chevron lifts quarterly dividend by 4 percent
text:
HOUSTON (Reuters) - Chevron Corp raised on Wednesday by 4 percent to $1.12, the 31st year in a row the U.S. oil producer has raised the payout.
The dividend is payable on March 12 Feb. 16. Chevron is due to report quarterly results on Friday.
The dividend increase was one of John Watson’s last actions as a member of Chevron’s board of directors. Watson retires on Thursday and will be replaced by his deputy, Mike Wirth.
Reporting Susan Thomas
